Stripe is a global payment processing pl: Stripe is a global payment processing platform that allows businesses and nonprofits to accept credit card payments (Visa, Mastercard, etc.) online.
Using Stripe alongside local bank paymen: Using Stripe alongside local bank payment methods is beneficial because local donors can use familiar bank transfers, while international donors or those who prefer credit cards can donate via Stripe. This way you reach more donors—both those with local bank accounts and those without.
What is Stripe and how do I set up a Pay: What is Stripe and how do I set up a Payment Link for DonationBox?
We believe it is important to make organ: We believe it is important to make organizing fundraisers in :country a quick, convenient, and, most importantly, fee free method for fundraisers.
According to various international regul: According to various international regulations, banks in :country and other countries are obliged to monitor payments in real time and ensure that no suspicious transactions pass through them. Otherwise, the bank has the right to freeze funds for transfer from your bank account until the investigation is completed. Therefore, be honest and state the real purpose for the transfer in the explanation.
Donorbox is an international online dona: Donorbox is an international online donation platform for non-profits. It allows you to start receiving donations for international payments systems. Donorbox integrates with payment processing platform Stripe, which allows automatically receive money directly to :country_adj IBAN bank account. Also, Donorbox allows you to make anonymous, recurring payments, connect CRM systems to process donor data, etc.
Under your own name you will see blue te: Under your own name you will see blue text indicating your Revolut username (@username).

Currently the service works only with lo: Currently the service works only with local IBAN accounts. In the near future the logic for European payments through :country_adj banks will be finalized.
Yes, it is possible. Just leave the IBAN: Yes, it is possible. Just leave the IBAN field blank and the selection with :country_adj banks will not appear on the donation form.
This donation box has no internet banks: This donation box has no internet banks or other payment methods configured. Please edit the link to enable at least one payment method.
SEB UID is available for non-profits and: SEB UID is available for non-profits and businesses only. Private individuals cannot obtain this token.

The feature of passing payment form para: The feature of passing payment form parameters through URLs is provided by banks free of charge. DonationBox is the app that brings those banking methods together under one simple donation form, without the need for any coding. That's also the reason why this app is free.
Cashier mode helps you accept donations: Cashier mode helps you accept donations in person with a QR code and payment link.

Set a fixed amount to convert this donat: Set a fixed amount to convert this donationbox into cashier mode. This will generate a QR code and payment link for the specified amount.
Enter the amount that will be preset for: Enter the amount that will be preset for all payments in cashier mode.
We generate a unique QR code and payment: We generate a unique QR code and payment link for this exact amount. Share it on screen, print, or message.
The customer scans the QR code or opens: The customer scans the QR code or opens the link, chooses a payment method, and confirms the payment.
Cashier mode allows you to accept paymen: Cashier mode allows you to accept payments by setting a specified amount. Once set and confirmed, you'll get a generated QR code and URL that can be passed to the customer or donor.
A free alternative to card terminals, qu: A free alternative to card terminals, quick money requests, and automated payment links.
What is Cashier mode? How does it work?: What is Cashier mode? How does it work?
Set the payment amount together with the: Set the payment amount together with the customer. This amount will be preset for the payment.
Generate a unique QR code and payment li: Generate a unique QR code and payment link for this specific amount. Share it with the customer via screen, print, or message.
Customer scans the QR code or opens the: Customer scans the QR code or opens the link. The amount is already set, so they just select their payment method (internet-bank or credit card) and complete the payment.
Free card terminal alternative - accept: Free card terminal alternative - accept payments in person without expensive hardware
Virtual money requests - send payment re: Virtual money requests - send payment requests with preset amounts via message or email
Payment request automations - append req: Payment request automations - append required donation value and updated payment description on the fly through URL parameters
Cashier mode is similar to 'money reques: Cashier mode is similar to 'money request' features provided by major banks like Swedbank, SEB, and others, but works across all supported payment methods in one unified interface. It's perfect for businesses, non-profits, and individuals who need a quick and free way to accept payments with preset amounts.
Launch a personal donation page in minut: Launch a personal donation page in minutes, then share a link or QR code so people can donate using their preferred payment method.
Add the campaign name, payment note, and: Add the campaign name, payment note, and recipient details, then choose which payment methods to accept.
We generate a unique URL and QR code for: We generate a unique URL and QR code for your donation page. Share it on social media, embed it on your site, or print it for offline events.
Donors open your link, choose an amount,: Donors open your link, choose an amount, pick a payment method, and complete the payment. Funds go directly to your bank account or payment provider.
Free, simple, and secure. No coding requ: Free, simple, and secure. No coding required. Works with local banks and international payment methods, and it's ideal for fundraisers, non-profits, and personal causes.
Update your donation page in minutes. Pa: Update your donation page in minutes. Paste your Donationbox URL to load current settings, then edit what you need.
Enter the full link to your existing Don: Enter the full link to your existing Donationbox. We'll load your current setup automatically.
Edit the campaign name, payment note, re: Edit the campaign name, payment note, recipient details, and payment methods. Everything is prefilled from your current settings.
After you save, you'll get a new URL. Re: After you save, you'll get a new URL. Replace any shared links or embedded widgets with the new address.
Editing creates a new URL. The old link: Editing creates a new URL. The old link will still work, but it won't show your updates, so update links and website widgets.
